val:
This sits at the back of my head for quite some time now and let me unpack Dr. Peterson’s teachings of which I’m trying to master..

There were a list of things that one should get right to have a life well lived. I guess I’m like aggregating in this blog what I believe Dr. Peterson’s teachings shed to debunk the important problems that face a normal human being..

  • Friendships - be friends with people who want the best for you. Stay away from people who lies from you. Quite difficult to crack open nowadays as most even hardly understand themselves even. The greatest people to associate with only focus on telling you the truth, which is most likely geared to seeing you grow and learn from your mistakes. I bet they are very rare to find as that was my experience.
